qa_list.question: What task does Table 11 evaluate?,answer: Twitter Named Entity Classification with Accuracy
What years are included in Table 11?,answer: 2013, 2016, 2019, 2022, 2010, 2012, 2014, 2016
What is being measured in Table 11?,answer: Accuracy
What types of tasks are evaluated in Table 11?,answer: Temporal task splits
What is mentioned in Table 12?,answer: Results on the AIC temporal task splits from (Luu et al., 2021)
What does Table 12 evaluate?,answer: Classification of science articles from Semantic Scholar into those published at ICML or AAAI, measured with Accuracy
What years are included in Table 12?,answer: 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019
What is being measured in Table 12?,answer: Accuracy
What task does Table 13 evaluate?,answer: Classification of political affiliation from tweets, measured in Accuracy
